meta.name: Bonnie - Yves Kitchen
meta.about:
Welcome to Bonnie - Yves Kitchen, a sharing place for country living style & home cooking. 

I am an Artisan Jam Maker / Food Stylist / Cookbook writer & columnist from Hong Kong.  Currently living in Scotland and sometimes in Thailand. 

Yves Kitchen was founded in 2005, starting from Cooking Studio, then extending our services to Marketing & PR jobs and also food styling consultant for media.  Bonnie also performed as a program host for TV and another medium. 

If you are looking for...
- Food Styling & Photography
- Recipe Development
- Product Testing & Review
- Cooking Tutorial & Demonstration
- Food, Travel & Lifestyle Writer

Please feel free to contact me via e-mail: bonnieyves2017@gmail.com
